thread.title: Garner Police Department names 9-year-old as honorary officer
thread.title_full: Garner Police Department names 9-year-old as honorary officer

title: Garner Police Department names 9-year-old as honorary officer
text:
Garner Police Department names 9-year-old as honorary officer 
Posted 8:35 p.m. today Your friends e-mail addresses (comma separated): * Subject: * Find News Near Me 
Garner, N.C. â€” The Garner Police Department added a special new recruit to its ranks Saturday. The Department and Make-A-Wish Eastern North Carolina named 9-year-old Khamari Campbell an honorary Garner police officer. 
Last September Khamari was diagnosed with a brain tumor, and the event was Khamari's wish as he has always wanted to be a police officer. 
He has been part of the Police Athletic and Activities League since the third grade. He is now in the fourth grade at Creech Wood Elementary School. Credits
